n: Delicious and Easy Corn on the Cob
des: "I learned this from a shopper in Stockbridge, Massachusetts when I was young. I have used this for 40 years and it has never failed to produce the most wonderful corn on the cob."
ins:
Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Stir sugar into water to dissolve; add corn, cover pot, and turn heat off, leaving pot on hot burner.
Steep corn in hot water until tender, about 25 minutes.
